elements.name: vaadin-context-menu

attributes.name: .items
.selector
attributes.description:
CSS selector that can be used to target any child element
of the context menu to listen for `openOn` events.

attributes.name: .openOn
attributes.description: Event name to listen for opening the context menu.

attributes.name: .listenOn
attributes.description:
The target element that's listened to for context menu opening events.
By default the vaadin-context-menu listens to the target's `vaadin-contextmenu`
events.

attributes.name: .closeOn
attributes.description: Event name to listen for closing the context menu.

attributes.name: .renderer
attributes.description:
Custom function for rendering the content of the menu overlay.
Receives three arguments:

- `root` The root container DOM element. Append your content to it.
- `contextMenu` The reference to the `<vaadin-context-menu>` element.
- `context` The object with the menu context, contains:
  - `context.target`  the target of the menu opening event,
  - `context.detail` the menu opening event detail.

attributes.name: .position
attributes.description:
Position of the overlay with respect to the target.
Supported values: null, `top-start`, `top`, `top-end`,
`bottom-start`, `bottom`, `bottom-end`, `start-top`,
`start`, `start-bottom`, `end-top`, `end`, `end-bottom`.

attributes.name: @closed
attributes.description: Fired when the context menu is closed.

attributes.name: @item-selected
attributes.description: Fired when an item is selected when the context menu is populated using the `items` API.
